yeah, the first hitman had some, bad stealth missions.

author: vladimirovitsj

text: You can play these games and just kill everyone, but I find playing for the silent assassin ranking to be much more rewarding.  The games are pretty fun though because they give you lots of ways to complete each mission.  I would reccomend just starting with blood money if you get some spare time, as the story is convoluted anyway!

text: I read that this series was aimed at being stealth based, but in the early games, someone on gamefaqs described to be "easier to charge in shooting like Rambo on steroids," but that the later games made you use more stealth.

author: Barbe

text: The games where always action packed. It matters how you play it. I beat Hitman Blood money twice once by sneaking around stealing outfits and chocking bitches. The I went back upgraded the shit out of my double ballers and went on a killing spree in every mission. Either way I had fun. Splinter cell conviction wasn't bad. Just easier. I enjoyed hit man and I want to see how they make the new one. From what I see from the newest trailer it still retains choice.
author: 77winkster

text:
Too bad the new Hitman sequel will do a "Splinter Cell: Conviction" and will be horribly dumbed down and action packed to cater to the COOWADOODY HOW PLAY GAEM? generation, games these days don't have the balls to be their own genr√© or brand of flavor. It's the same reason I can't buy Hitman: Contracts on steam, because it tread to closely to a grim reality of the world the game takes place in. (The Meatkings party, etc.)

I won't be looking forward to having the mission force fed to me.

text: This theme reminds me a little of Perfect Dark.
author: NYCrazyRob

text: Not really a stealth game. It is a do it your way game. You can literally kill everyone if you wanted to. One of the things that makes Hitman so cool is that you can beat a mission differently every time. It is all up to you. If you really want to try it then buy blood money it is the best in the series.

text:
get the old ones. the new one looks good, but they're changing alot of what made them great. im still getting it, though.
Contracts/blood money are the best.
author: Reaper679

text: You should definitely try it, Blood Money especially. I'm lousy at stealth games, but even I can do pretty alright. There are so many ways to approach your objectives and it feels so cool to blend into the crowd and wait for the moment to strike. You never feel like you're forced to do things only a certain way and the game always rewards you for coming up with a clever solution.
author: Outlaw Otaku

text: I really love the hitman 2 menu song
author: Oblivionatingstud

text: Each hitman game always felt different. Hitman 1 had a special story and very hard missions, Hitman 2 was amazing in my opinion, hitman contracts was a remake of hitman 1, and it felt very dark and depressing. Hitman BM gave me the hitman 2 feeling again, BM had great stealth missions and it felt very good when you completed a level.Ive heard that Hitman 5 is kinda a mess, tough il buy it and hope i can run it on this PC :D
